snippet: On Mitt Romney's playlist, songs extol love and perseverance, maturity and positive aspiration, adding a little road-weary loneliness to deflect thoughts of cold elitism
abstract: On Mitt Romney's playlist, songs extol love and perseverance, maturity and positive aspiration, adding a little road-weary loneliness to deflect thoughts of cold elitism

headline.print_headline: On Romney Song List, Guys Win, 18 to 1
